text: 1998-99 Hong Kong FA Cup was the 24th staging of the Hong Kong FA Cup. It was competed by all of the 8 teams from Hong Kong First Division League. The competition kicked off on 29 April 1999 and finished on 25 MayHKFA Website, 足總盃回顧(九) 2007-05-14 with the final. South China won the cup for the seventh time after beating Instant-Dict 1-0 in the final. ==Fixtures and results == Rsssf.com, Hongkong 1998/99 ===Bracket=== ===Final === HKFA Website, 足總盃回顧(十) 2007-05-17 ==References== Category:Hong Kong FA Cup Hong Kong Fa Cup Fa Cup
title: 1998–99 Hong Kong FA Cup
